title: Handle a Supplier Factory Audit
description: As part of a corporate responsibility program, a company needs to conduct an audit of a new supplier's factory.

tasks.description: Schedule the factory audit with the supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: A date for the audit is agreed upon.

tasks.description: An auditor visits the factory and uses a digital checklist to assess compliance with labor laws, safety standards, and environmental regulations.
Generate an audit report with the findings.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is created, noting any areas of non-compliance.

tasks.description: If issues are found, work with the supplier on a corrective action plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: A plan is created to address the issues found in the audit.
